products.name: Stouffer's French Bread Pizza Deluxe - 2 ct

extendedInfo.detail: Sausage, pepperoni, mushrooms, red & green peppers & onions, pepperoni made with pork, chicken & beef.  Per Pizza: 430 calories; 8 g sat fat (40% DV); 970 mg sodium (42% DV); 5 g total sugars; 16 g protein (30% DV); 210 mg calcium (15% DV).  See nutrition information for total fat, sat fat and sodium content. Nutritional Compass: Nestle. Thoughtful Portion: 1 portion = 1 pizza. Talk food with us: Text or call us 1-800-225-1180, Stouffers.com.  Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.  Now with 50% more cheese! Calcium propionate added to preserve freshness of crust. Ready in less than 13 mins. An American classic. The satisfaction you love from Stouffer's. See quick cooking instructions on back.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Bread (Enriched Wheat Flour [Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid], Water, Yeast, 2% Or Less Of Soybean Oil, Wheat Gluten, Salt, Sugar, Acetic Acid, Lactic Acid, Fumaric Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Enzymes, Calcium Propionate [Preservative]), Sauce (Water, Tomato Paste, Sugar, Soybean Oil, 2% Or Less Of Modified Food Starch, Garlic, Spices, Salt, Distilled Vinegar, Onion, Cultured Dextrose, Potassium Chloride, Garlic Powder, Paprika, Natural Hickory Smoke Flavor), Cheese Mozzarella Part Skim (Pasteurized Part Skim Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Cooked Italian Sausage (Pork, Water, Spices, Salt, Sugar, Flavorings), Pepperoni Made With Pork, Chicken And Beef (Pork, Mechanically Separated Chicken, Beef, Salt, Contains 2% Or Less Of Spices, Dextrose, Pork Stock, Lactic Acid Starter Culture, Oleoresin Of Paprika, Flavoring, Sodium Nitrite, Sodium Ascorbate, Paprika, Processed With Natural Smoke Flavor, BHA, BHT, Citric Acid To Help Protect Flavor), Margarine (Soybean Oil, Water, Mono & Diglycerides, 2% Or Less Of Salt, Natural Flavor, Vitamin A Palmitate, Vitamin D3), 2% Or Less Of Green Bell Peppers, Red Bell Peppers, Mushrooms (Mushrooms, Water, Salt), Onions.
extendedInfo.directions: Cook thoroughly. For food safety and quality, follow these cooking instructions. Oven (Preheat oven 400 degrees F): 1. Remove pizza(s) from box & wrap. 2. Pour ingredients left in wrap onto pizza. 3. Place pizza on baking sheet, center rack. 4. Bake 24 minutes. 5. Let stand 1 minute. Need Stouffer's fast? Micro-Air Fry: Microwave (1100 w) + air fryer (preheat air fryer 300 degrees F): 1. Remove pizza from box & wrap. 2. Pour ingredients left in wrap onto pizza. 3. Place pizza on microwave safe plate. 4. Microwave pizza on high: 1 pizza 1 1/2 minutes. 5. Carefully place pizza in preheated air fryer. 6. Cook: 1 pizza 6 minutes. 7. Let stand 1 minute. Micro-Bake: microwave (1100 w) + oven (preheat oven 425 degrees F): 1. Remove pizza(s) from box & wrap. 2. Pour ingredients left in wrap onto pizza. 3. Place pizza on microwave-safe plate. 4. Microwave pizza on high: 1 pizza 1 1/2 minutes; 2 pizzas 2 minutes. 5. Carefully place pizza on baking sheet, center rack of preheated oven. 6. Bake: 1 pizza 6 minutes; 2 pizzas 9 minutes. 7. Let stand 1 minute. Will be hot! Ensure product reaches an internal temperature of 165 degrees F. Directions developed using 1100 watt microwave oven. Ovens and air fryers vary; cooking time may need adjusting.  Keep frozen.  To Open: Push in pull out.
